name: UFGUnlock
comment: Base class for unlocks that you get when purchasing/research a schematic

methods.name: OnUnlock
methods.comment: Unlock is only called when you unlock this unlock the first time

methods.name: Unlock
methods.comment: Unlock is only called when you unlock this unlock the first time

methods.name: OnApply
methods.comment: Apply is called when you unlock this unlock the first time and every time the unlock is reapplied when a game is loaded

methods.name: Apply
methods.comment: Apply is called when you unlock this unlock the first time and every time the unlock is reapplied when a game is loaded

methods.name: IsRepeatPurchasesAllowed
methods.comment: Returns true if this unlock is allowed to be purchased more than once

methods.name: GetWorld
methods.comment:
To allow the unlock classes to spawn widgets we need to implement GetWorld even if it returns a nullptr
We use a provided worldcontext in blueprints to spawn widgets in these objects
